document_data.name: Old Tarlow
document_data.mainbody: a wererat, Tarlow had white fur, long gray hair and a beard.
document_data.Description: As a wererat, Tarlow had white fur, long gray hair and a beard.
document_data.History: Old Tarlow lived in Wheloon Prison with his fellow gangsters until they were forced out by the [[Night Brigade]] under [[Storna Harnwood]], who turned their hideout into a [[Temple of Shar (Wheloon)|Temple of Shar]]. After being driven away, Tarlow represented the Rats as a whole and got outside help as they launched counterattacks on the Night Brigade.
